div.p: Health care and Emergency Workers: As Directed By Governor Walz, Albert Lea Area Schools will be offering free school age child care for 5-12 year old students from 7:30am-3:30pm starting Wednesday, March 18, in the Albert Lea Area School elementary buildings and SWMS. There is a list of eligible healthcare and emergency workers below. If you are interested in school age child care please contact your student’s elementary school or Southwest Middle School to provide information to​ office​ staff. Also let us know if transportation will be required.
